channel.title: Debbie Schroeder on Steve Easterbrook (NON-OFFICIAL)
channel.description: Recent content in Debbie Schroeder on Steve Easterbrook (NON-OFFICIAL)

item.title: Debbie Schroeder, Investors Relations, McDonald’s Corporation, is still looking for the information I asked.
item.description: From: Debbie Schroeder (Investors Relations, McDonald’s Corporation) Subject: : disclosure about the illegality of McDonald’s Monopoly in Europe Date sent: December 30, 2015, 22:49 (Beijing time) To: France-v-McDonalds.org <info@france-v-mcdonalds.org> Hi, X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) - Thank you for passing along your questions – I am still looking into them and will get back to you as soon as possible. In the meantime, will you please let me know what company/firm you are from as well as a phone number should we have any clarification questions ?
